title: Patch 7.3 Language Filter Issue
body:
Language filter is on even if you checked it off, I hope this is a bug and not a new design. If so, that is just pathetic. 

Go type any swear and it will look like this: ****

replies.body: If your getting **** type /chatfilter in the chat and hit enter. It will say “Profanity Filter Enabled” but it disables it. Proceed to type your favorite curse and it should not censor.

> [{quoted}](name=Quantum Velocity,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=wAEKkBm1,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-02-12T17:26:10.889+0000)
>
> If your getting **** type /chatfilter in the chat and hit enter. It will say “Profanity Filter Enabled” but it disables it. Proceed to type your favorite curse and it should not censor.

Oh thank you my good sir

Omg, this finally fixed this... It was gettijng SO annoying, it wasn't even funny. 

THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!{{champion:17}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I haven't tested this but if it works. THANK YOU. It's SO annoying that mother****er is turned into **** and so on.
"Anyone I've asked in game is like, you can't turn it off any more," so I thought it was done on purpose.

Holy shit you're the man. I've been trying everything for weeks now and this is the only thing which has done it.

Profanity laden chat, I missed you.

> [{quoted}](name=Quantum Velocity,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=wAEKkBm1,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-02-12T17:26:10.889+0000)
>
> If your getting **** type /chatfilter in the chat and hit enter. It will say “Profanity Filter Enabled” but it disables it. Proceed to type your favorite curse and it should not censor.

thank you so much. this is the only thing that worked.

I have fixed it, if the checkbox is already unticked, just tick it again and go into a custom game type in a swear, the asterisks will be there. Afterwards exit, go untick the language filter, hop into a game and the words should no longer be censored
Having this issue as well.  I've everything, can't get it off.
Same issue here. Went to take a look at my config files, and "EnableChatFilter" is still set to 0. Anyone has any idea?
I was getting scared they were gonna keep this permanent with the new client... was about to quit playin.

I have it too. But its not new. There are threads dating back as early as 2012 with this same issue. Thing is, back then I used to just set filter to 0 in shared .properties file and was good to go. Now that trick does not work :( Have to try what you did by ticking it and making custom...
I think this has something to do with the old client...
Same problem. It doesn't turn off for me
Same here.... same with my friend too
